sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row class="custom" align="center" justify="center" >
      <apexchart ref="myChart" ype="area" width="1800" height="550" :options="chartOptions" :series="series"></apexchart>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>

import VueApexCharts from 'vue-apexcharts'
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  components: {
    apexchart: VueApexCharts,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      series: [
        {
          name: 'Temperature',
          data: [31, 40, 28, 51, 42, 109, 100, 19, 77, 81]
        }, {
          name: 'Humidity',
          data: [11, 32, 45, 32, 34, 52, 41, 76, 11, 43]
        } 
      ],
      chartOptions: {
        chart: {
          height: 350,
          type: 'area',
          toolbar: {
            show: false
          }
        },
        dataLabels: {
          enabled: false
        },
        stroke: {
          curve: 'smooth'
        }
      }
    }   
  },
  methods: {
    setData(data) {
      this.series[0].data = data.temperature
      console.log(this.series[0].data)
      this.series[1].data = data.humidity
      this.$refs.myChart.updateSeries(this.series);
    },
    getData() {

      let URL = "http://127.0.0.1:8005/data?amount=15"

      fetch(URL)
      .then((response) => response.json())
      .then((data) => {
        let datapoints = JSON.parse(data)
        this.setData(datapoints)
      })
      .catch(function(error) {
        console.log(error);
      });
    } 
  },
  mounted() {
    setInterval(() => {
        this.getData()}, 3000)
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
